players_see_self.Name: See YOUR stats?
players_see_self.Hint: If enabled, the player can see their own stats. Recomended On

players_see_players.Name: See OTHER players stats?
players_see_players.Hint: If enabled, the player can see other players stats. Reccomended On

players_see_gm.Name: See GM roll data?
players_see_gm.Hint: If enabled, the player can see the GM's stats. If you are the GM this is useless. Reccomended Off

players_see_global.Name: See GLOBAL roll data?
players_see_global.Hint: If enabled, the player can see the global stats. Reccomended On

players_see_gm_in_global.Name: See GM Stats In Global Roll Data?
players_see_gm_in_global.Hint: GM Dice Stats will not be included in Global Stats Screen unless this is enabled. (This impacts GM global stats button too)

enable_persistant_data.Name: Enable Database Saving?
enable_persistant_data.Hint: If enabled stats will be saved between sessions

enable_blind_rolls_immediate.Name: Allow blind rolls to be immediately added to player stats
enable_blind_rolls_immediate.Hint: If enabled hidden rolls can be seen by players just by looking at their stats

enable_auto_db.Name: Automatically use DB
enable_auto_db.Hint: Enabled means rolls will get saved and loaded from DB automatically. Could Negatively Impact Player Performance!!

enable_crit_msgs.Name: Stop All Crit Messages From Being Displayed To chat
enable_crit_msgs.Hint: Empty = Disabled | 20, 4 = Crits for d20 and d4's are printed

types_of_crit_msgs.Name: Select Type of Crits to Display
types_of_crit_msgs.Hint: Choose what crit vales you want to display

enable_streak_msgs.Name: List Die types to have streaks printed to chat
enable_streak_msgs.Hint: Empty = Disabled | 20, 4 = Streaks for d20 and d4's are printed

enable_blind_streak_msgs.Name: See blind streaks
enable_blind_streak_msgs.Hint: If a streak has a blind roll in it its not printed to chat unless this is enabled

enable_other_access_buttons.Name: Use Updated Player Access Buttons
enable_other_access_buttons.Hint: Changes access buttons from the player list to Scene Controls, Uncheck to revert to old buttons

player_access_icons.Name: Define Players Icons
player_access_icons.Hint:
Used to change player Icons from D-20's to something custom. Check GITHUB for better guide!
Need to use https://fontawesome.com/search?o=r&m=free Font Awesome Icons in a comma seperated list. Order matching players in player list 
EX: fa-solid fa-frog, fa-solid fa-circle, fa-solid fa-skull-crossbones

global_data_form.title: GLOBAL Roll Data
global_data_form.blind_rolls: There Are {ui_rollcount} Blind rolls between all players
global_data_form.blind_roll_btn: Push Players Blind Rolls to Graph

player_data_form.blind_rolls: You have {ui_rolls} Blind Rolls Which are Not Tracked. Ask GM to Push Rolls
player_data_form.streak_blind: Streak Includes a Blind Roll, Data Hidden
player_data_form.load_data_btn: Load ALL player data From DB
player_data_form.load_data_btn_yours: Load in YOUR player data from DB
player_data_form.load_data_btn_others: Load in ALL OTHER players data from DB
player_data_form.save_data_btn: Save YOUR Player Data To DB
player_data_form.clear_your_both: Clear YOUR Local And DB Values

save_to_db.title: Confirm Save
save_to_db.context: Are you sure you want to save YOUR values to database? This will overwrite all your prev saved values.

load_all_db.title: Confirm Load
load_all_db.context: Are you sure you want to load Values from database? This will overwrite all players roll data including your own.

load_your_db.title: Confirm Load
load_your_db.context: Are you sure you want to load Values from database? This will overwrite all players roll data including your own.

load_others_db.title: Confirm Load
load_others_db.context: Are you sure you want to load Values from database? This will overwrite all players roll data including your own.

clear_all_db.title: Confirm Clear
clear_all_db.context: Are you sure you would like to clear All Local roll data? This will clear All users roll data locally. It It will not impact the DB values or values on other players screens.

clear_your_db.title: Confirm Clear
clear_your_db.context: Are you sure you would like to clear YOUR roll data? This will clear YOUR users roll data locally. It It will not impact the DB values or values on other players screens.

clear_all_local.title: Confirm Clear
clear_all_local.context: Are you sure you would like to clear all locally stored data?

clear_your_local.title: Confirm Clear
clear_your_local.context: Are you sure you would like to clear your locally stored data?

clear_both.title: Confirm Clear
clear_both.context: Are you sure you want to clear YOUR local and DB values?

clear_all_local_data.title: Confirm Clear
clear_all_local_data.context: Are you sure wou would like to clear all roll data? This will clear all locally stored data on EVERY client. DB Values are still saved.

clear_all_db_data.title: Confirm Clear
clear_all_db_data.context: Are you sure you would like to clear all roll data? This will clear all players DB values. But local Data will stay.

clear_all_data.title: Confirm Clear
clear_all_data.context: Are you sure you would like to clear all roll data? This will clear all players DB and locally stored values.
